tool_description: Validates vendor experience claims by verifying project history, client references, and relevant industry experience.

vendor_id.description: Unique identifier for the vendor to validate

required_experience_years.description: Minimum years of relevant experience required

industry_experience_required.description: Required industry sectors for experience validation

project_size_requirements.description: Required project sizes or complexity levels

client_type_requirements.description: Required client types (e.g., government, enterprise, SMB)

verification_level.description: Verification thoroughness: basic, standard, or detailed

error_messages: Vendor not found: The specified vendor_id does not exist
Invalid experience years: Must be a positive integer between 1 and 50
Invalid verification level: Must be one of [basic, standard, detailed]
Insufficient reference data: Unable to verify experience claims due to lack of reference information
Verification timeout: Experience validation process exceeded time limit
usage: Specify vendor_id, required_experience_years, industry_experience_required, and project_size_requirements. Set verification_level based on validation thoroughness needed.

experience_verified.description: Whether experience claims were successfully verified

verified_years_experience.description: Number of years of verified relevant experience

reference_validation_status.description: Status of reference validation: verified, partially_verified, or unverified

experience_summary.description: Summary of validated experience and key findings
